body:
## What happened

I compiled for the first time the demo app with flutter stable. I went to the terminal in the IDE to change the channel to dev. I ran flutter upgrade. After a few seconds this exception was thrown and the IDE told me to file this bug report.

## Version information (what the IDE gave me)

IntelliJ IDEA `2021.1.2` â€¢ Flutter plugin `io.flutter 57.0.5` â€¢ Dart plugin `211.7665`

No Flutter sdk configured.

## Version information (flutter doctor -v)

[âœ“] Flutter (Channel dev, 2.3.0-24.0.pre, on Arch Linux 5.12.12-xanmod1-1, locale en_US.UTF-8)
    â€¢ Flutter version 2.3.0-24.0.pre at /home/roscale/flutter
    â€¢ Upstream repository https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
    â€¢ Framework revision 2b9537c783 (3 weeks ago), 2021-06-11 22:11:53 -0700
    â€¢ Engine revision ddbac024d1
    â€¢ Dart version 2.14.0 (build 2.14.0-188.0.dev)

[âœ“] Android toolchain - develop for Android devices (Android SDK version 30.0.3)
    â€¢ Android SDK at /home/roscale/Android/Sdk
    â€¢ Platform android-30, build-tools 30.0.3
    â€¢ Java binary at:
      /home/roscale/.local/share/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/AndroidStudio/ch-0/202.7486908/jre/bin/java
    â€¢ Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.8+0-b944-P17168821)
    â€¢ All Android licenses accepted.

[âœ—] Chrome - develop for the web (Cannot find Chrome executable at google-chrome)
    ! Cannot find Chrome. Try setting CHROME_EXECUTABLE to a Chrome executable.

[âœ“] Linux toolchain - develop for Linux desktop
    â€¢ clang version 12.0.0
    â€¢ cmake version 3.20.5
    â€¢ ninja version 1.10.2
    â€¢ pkg-config version 1.7.3

[âœ“] Android Studio (version 4.2)
    â€¢ Android Studio at /home/roscale/.local/share/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/AndroidStudio/ch-0/202.7486908
    â€¢ Flutter plugin can be installed from:
      ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/9212-flutter
    â€¢ Dart plugin can be installed from:
      ðŸ”¨ https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/6351-dart
    â€¢ Java version OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.8+0-b944-P17168821)

[âœ“] IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition (version 2021.1)
    â€¢ IntelliJ at /home/roscale/.local/share/JetBrains/Toolbox/apps/IDEA-U/ch-0/211.7442.40
    â€¢ Flutter plugin version 57.0.5
    â€¢ Dart plugin version 211.7665

[âœ“] Connected device (1 available)
    â€¢ Linux (desktop) â€¢ linux â€¢ linux-x64 â€¢ Arch Linux 5.12.12-xanmod1-1

! Doctor found issues in 1 category.

## Exception

Trying to reset custom component in a presentation

```
java.lang.Throwable
	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.Presentation.putClientProperty(Presentation.java:425)
```

comment_data.body: This is fixed in the latest release, published a few minutes ago.

title: Plugin exception
